description: Lundin Mining Corp. is a metal based company, which engages in mining, exploration and development of mineral properties, primarily in Chile, USA, Portugal and Sweden. The company is headquartered in Toronto, Ontario and currently employs 4,288 full-time employees.  The firm is engaged in mining, exploration and development of mineral properties, primarily in Chile, the United States, Portugal, Sweden and the Democratic Republic of Congo (DRC). Its segments include Candeleria, Chapada, Eagle, Neves-Corvo, Zinkgruvan, Tenke Fungurume and Other. Its geographical segments include Europe, Asia, South America and North America. The company is engaged in producing copper, nickel and zinc. Its operating assets include the Eagle mine located in the United States, the Neves-Corvo mine located in Portugal and the Zinkgruvan mine located in Sweden. The company also owns the Candelaria and Ojos del Salado mining complex (Candelaria) located in Chile. The company is engaged in drilling on the Elida porphyry project.
naicsNationalIndustry: Copper Ore and Nickel Ore Mining
name: Lundin Mining Corp
